title: Change the specific option for font modification to a form instead of setting different font types separately.
content: I am a report commissioner and a human rights volunteer, so I need to visit the reporting articles in different countries, and fonts are also a key way to view them, because sometimes I encounter fonts that can't be displayed, so I can only modify specific fonts in the browser to display characters and text symbols, but I need a specific type of text every time, which makes me feel very inconvenient! So I hope that in later versions, this function can be optimized, thank you for your understanding.
creator: shuihez

title: There are  two sites giving me this error message. I cannot contact them because I cannot get in.
content:
Please Help. I am unable to get into 2 different sites due to this error message. (self.MozillaTech)

submitted 18 hours ago by lovescrabble to r/MozillaTech 

   commentsharesavehidedeletensfwspoilercrosspost

I got through once by removing the https, but that no longer works. They came up with a solution that only worked once. I am not tech saavy and neither site has never worked and I've used them for years. Was or Is there an update that may have caused this.

I'm going on a month now not being able to access one.

Here's the message...

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to nebulance.io. SSL received a record that exceeded the maximum permissible length.

Error code: SSL_ERROR_RX_RECORD_TOO_LONG

The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified. Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.
creator: katiems57
